description: Advertisement Consent in connection with proposed installation of a Euronet NCR Self Serv 26 ATM through the Goodwin Street elevation shop front. NCR Self Serv 26 ATM fascia with illuminated Euronet yellow and blue fascia sign. An illuminated projecting ATM sign is proposed to be installed below the existing Bureau De Exchange projecting sign. (Full Planning application Ref: P2017/3629 also submitted).
decision_conditions:
STANDARD ADVERTISEMENT CONDITION (COMPLIANCE):  Any advertisement displayed and any site used for the display of advertisements, shall be maintained in a clean and tidy condition to the reasonable satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority. 

Any structure or hoarding erected or used principally for the purpose of displaying advertisements shall be maintained in a safe condition. 

Where an advertisement is required under these Regulations to be removed, the removal shall be carried out to the reasonable satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority. 

No advertisement is to be displayed without permission of the owner of the site or any other people with an interest in the site entitled to grant permission. 

No advertisement shall be sited or displayed so as to obscure, or hinder the ready interpretation of any road traffic sign, railway signal or aid to navigation by water or air, or so as otherwise to render hazardous the use of any highway, railway, waterway (including any coastal waters) or aerodrome (civil or military).
